page.title: 08Farming
page.content: The area that we looked at was almost all fields.It is said to be one of the best agricultural areas around. The fields in our block usually were growing grass or cereal crops.The grass was either for grazing cattle or for turning into hay and sileage.The cereals were mainly barley and wheat,though there were potatoes,peas, and rape seed oil crops. There were 20 farms and most of them farmed in similar ways i.e.cereals and beef but 5 had dairy herds and some had sheep.Summer is the busiest time for the farmers,with hay,sileage and harvesting crops to be done.Most of the farmers buy their calves at markets,rear them and fatten them,and then sell them again at market.The local market for livestock is Cowbridge.Barley is sold to other farmers and wheat sent to the mills.
